short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open links easily in a new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform selected text into custom links with the "Open as Link" extension. Define your own URLs, effortlessly opening them in new tabs. 

Features:
- Define your own URLs for selected text, providing personalized browsing experiences.
- Right-click on selected text to open it as a link in a new tab, eliminating the need for copy-pasting.
- Ideal for developers seeking efficient ways to navigate and reference documentation or code snippets.
- Reorder your links based on your preferences
- Open multiple links in new tabs simultaneously, enhancing research and reference workflows.
- Dark/Light Mode
- Backup/Restore Links.
